name: NEO CHROME HARDWARE
description: SPICE UP YOUR CUSTOM STEERING WHEEL WITH A LITTLE MORE CUSTOM! THIS HARDWARE GIVE YOUR STEERING WHEEL SETUP THAT LITTLE BIT EXTRA TO STAND OUT FROM THE CROWD!

name: AVENUE PERFORMANCE STEERING WHEEL BLACK LEATHER
description:
Avenue leather steering wheels are real leather using the highest quality materials. We feature a 350mm diameter and a 35mm depth to ensure a great feeling steering wheel in your vehicle.

FEATURES:
  - 350MM Diameter
  - 35MM Spoke Depth
  - Momo/Sparco 6 Bolt Mounting Pattern

___________________________________________________

INCLUDES:

-STEERING WHEEL
-HORN
-HORN BEZEL
-HORN HARNESS
-HARDWARE (SS or BLACK & ALLEN KEY)

___________________________________________________

COLOR DESCRIPTION:

    This is a black leather with the stiching toward the inside of the wheel. Keep your car classy with this classic look
___________________________________________________

PICTURES ARE TAKEN FROM THE ACTUAL AVENUE STEERING WHEEL.  WOOD GRAIN AND COLOR MIGHT APPEAR DIFFERENT FROM PICTURE TAKEN
________________________________

name: GUNMETAL WEIGHTED SHIFT KNOB TYPE R STYLE
description:
This is a great shift knob for anyone looking to add a performance feel to their ride!! Feels great in your hand and great weight to slide right into gear. This is for the people that dont want a ball style and like to grip the shifter.
___________________________________________________

FEATURES:
      -  Egg shape or Type R style feel
      -  1LB Weight
      -  True mounting threads NO INSERTS

___________________________________________________

Color Description:
       
             GUNMETAL: We call this gunmetal but its really more like a black chrome look. This shiny piece of goodness keeps it classy with just enough shine to set it off
     
___________________________________________________

Thread Fitment:

      10x1.25 : Ferrari, 300zx, geo storm, hyundai manual, Isuzu Impulse, kia forte, Most Mazda, Mazda Miata, Most Mitsubishi Manuals, Most Nissan Manuals, Subaru Automatic, Shelby 500 "no supersnake or KR" ford probe manual

      10x1.50 :  All Acura manuals, All Honda manual, Lotus Elise 05-jan. 09, Lotus Exige 05-jan 09, dodge dakota manual

name: SRK-200NB - Quick Release Gen 2.0 (New Blue w/ Titanium Chrome Ring)
description: The SRK-200NB generation 2.0 Quick Release features many options that conventional ball-locking quick release system do not. The Generation 2.0 is specially engineered with raised sections to prevent the scratching and stretching of the hub while a self locking feature adds increased safety and functionality. Features a new blue body with titanium chrome ring for added style and look. Each unit is made from the highest quality aircraft grade aluminum and is anodized for maximum durability and finish.

name: s13/s14 REAR TRACTION ARMS
description: These fully adjustable rear traction arms are a great addition to your s chassis This replaces those old worn our bushing and thin fragile non adjustable arms with these beefy pillowball mount end . They also feature hex near the threaded ends to provide ease of adjustment.

name: S13 REAR UPPER CONTROL ARMS
description: These are fully adjustable RUCA for a S13. They have a reinforcement plates welded on to ensure strength. This arm allows you to adjust camber on the rear of your s13.

name: 06-11 CIVIC RLCA (NEO CHROME)
description: These control arms look awesome. They are machined from 6061 T6 aluminum, then custom coated with that bright neo chrome finish.

name: S13 NISSAN 240SX 89-94 AVENUE COILOVERS COILOVERS
description:
-Front and rear pillowball mounts

-Compression and rebound setting easily adjustable

-CNC machined locking spring collars

-One year warranty from manufacturing defects

-32 Levels of Damper Force Adjustment

-Spring rate 8Kg/mm Front/ 6 Kg/mm Rear

-Spring rate 10Kg/mm Front/ 8 Kg/mm Rear

-Pillow Ball Upper Mounts with Front Camber Plates

-Corrosion resistance treated

-Rubber Dust Boots on all Pistons

-Adjustable Ride Height

-Aggressive Spring Rates available

-Single-Cylinder Design

-Aluminum Brackets

-All Hardware is Included

name: SRK-200BK QUICK RELEASE V 2.0 BLACK Ti CHROME RING
description:
BLACK BODY
TITANIUM CHROME RING
The SRK-200BK generation 2.0 Quick Release features many options that conventional ball-locking quick release system do not. The Generation 2.0 is specially engineered with raised sections to prevent the scratching and stretching of the hub while a self locking feature adds increased safety and functionality. Features a black body with titanium chrome ring for added style and look. Each unit is made from the highest quality aircraft grade aluminum and is anodized for maximum durability and finish.

name: SRK-250BK - Quick Release Gen 2.5 (Black Body w/ Black Ring)
description: The SRK-250BK Quick Release utilizes all the features of the Second Generation Systems ball-locking quick release system engineered with raised sections to prevent the scratching and stretching of the hub while a self locking feature adds increased safety and functionality, with the added benefit of an upgraded flared ring. This allows much easier release for the steering wheel by providing added leverage and grip onto the pull ring. Features a black body with a black ring for added style and look to any vehicle. Perfect for race applications where the use of gloves are required.

name: SRK-250CF Quick Release Gen 2.5 (Black Body w/ Black Carbon Fiber Ring)
description: The SRK-250CF Quick Release utilizes all the features of the Second Generation Systems ball-locking quick release system engineered with raised sections to prevent the scratching and stretching of the hub while a self locking feature adds increased safety and functionality, with the added benefit of an upgraded flared ring. This allows much easier release for the steering wheel by providing added leverage and grip onto the pull ring. Features a black body with a black Carbon Fiber ring for added style and look to any vehicle. Perfect for race applications where the use of gloves are required.
